input_email_body:
Subject: Assistance Required for Touchscreen Settings Issue

Dear Tech Online Store Customer Support,

I hope this message finds you well. I am reaching out to request assistance with configuring the touchscreen settings on my Microsoft Surface Pro 7 My name is Liu Wei.. I have been experiencing some difficulties in setting it up to meet my preferences and would greatly appreciate any guidance or support you could provide. 

I attempted to resolve the issue using the troubleshooting steps listed on your website, but unfortunately, the problem persists. Could you please offer more detailed instructions or suggest alternative solutions? If needed, I am also available for a call or a remote session to further diagnose the issue.

Thank you for your attention and assistance in advance.

Best regards,

<name> You can reach me at elena.ivanova@support.org.
